extendedInfo.description: Theme Name:                         Firefox OS HD ThemeMain features:    Covers new wallpaper, icons                              Make sure your phone with android OS 4.0+If you have some particular themes in your mind, just tell us by emails or make more comments, we can make one for you.Besides,if you want to find some other themes of our team,please click "More from developer".We hope you can find you themes there.What's more, remember to email us for any problems before giving a bad review.  and we will check our email box everyday and we will appreciate your kindly feedback!Do not forget it is free and it keeps free forever.and thank you for downloading this theme and we hope you can enjoy it!TAGS:Firefox OS Theme  Firefox OS Live Wallpaper  Firefox OS Wallpaper  Firefox OS Wallpaper  Firefox OS Icon Pack  Firefox OS Theme Free; Firefox OS hd Theme  Firefox OS hd Live Wallpaper  Firefox OS  hd Wallpaper  Firefox OS hd Wallpaper  Firefox OS hd Icon Pack  Firefox OS hd Theme Free
